description.pt:
1 - Quando Osamu corta a bola levantada por Atsumu, esse ataque terá a força de [Ataque Rápido] do Osamu x (Lv1: 265%, Lv2: 280%, Lv3: 295%, Lv4: 310%, Lv5: 325%), realizando o Ataque em Tempo Negativo dos Gêmeos que não pode ser bloqueado. 
2 - O atributo [Técnica de Ataque] do Osamu aumenta em 15%. Esse aumento dura até que Atsumu ou Osamu saiam da quadra.
description.en:
1 - When Osamu spikes a ball set by Atsumu, that spike will have the power of Osamu's Quick Attack x (Lv1: 265%, Lv2: 280%, Lv3: 295%, Lv4: 310%, Lv5: 325%), performing the Twins' Negative Time Attack that cannot be blocked. 
2 - Osamu's [Attack Technique] stat increases by 15%. This increase lasts until either Atsumu or Osamu leave the court.

description.pt: Aumenta o Ataque Potente de Iwaizumi SSR e Kentaro SSR.
description.en: Increases Power Attack of Iwaizumi SSR and Kentaro SSR

description.pt: Bokuto perde o efeito do "Modo Deprimido". Quando Bokuto corta a bola levantada por Akaashi, esse ataque terá a força de [Ataque Potente] x (Lv1: 265%, Lv2: 280%, Lv3: 295%, Lv4: 310%, Lv5: 325%). Com esse ataque, o status [Ataque Potente] do Bokuto é aumentado em 20% e aumenta a moral do time em 15.
description.en: Bokuto loses the effect of "Depressed Mode." When Bokuto spikes a ball set by Akaashi, that spike will have the power of [Power Attack] x (Lv1: 265%, Lv2: 280%, Lv3: 295%, Lv4: 310%, Lv5: 325%). With that spike, Bokuto's [Power Attack] stat increases by 20% and Team Morale increases by 15.

description.pt: Atributo [Passe] do Akaashi aumenta em (Lv1: 6%, Lv2: 7%, Lv3: 8%, Lv4: 9%, Lv5: 10%). Quando o time aliado está com o Reforço de Moral do Time ativado, nesse período o atributo [Ataque Potente] do Bokuto aumenta em 18% e o atributo [Passe] do Akaashi aumenta em mais 5%.
description.en: Akaashi's [Set] stat increases by (Lv1: 6%, Lv2: 7%, Lv3: 8%, Lv4: 9%, Lv5: 10%). When the allied team has Team Morale Boost active, during that time Bokuto's [Power Attack] stat increases by 18% and Akaashi's [Set] stat increases by an additional 5%.

description.pt:
1 - Os aliados presentes em quadra com habilidades de Bloqueio tem a força do [Bloqueio] aumentado em [Bloqueio] x (Lv1: 6%; Lv2: 7%; Lv3: 8%; Lv4: 9%; Lv5: 10%). 
2 - O CD da habilidade 2 diminui em 2 cruzamentos de rede. 
3 - Quando aliado ativa uma habilidade de Saque, aplica o efeito debuff "Fúria" nos adversários, reduzindo o atributo [Ataque Rápido/Ataque Potente] do adversário em 10%. Esse efeito permanece por 8 cruzamentos de rede.
description.en:
1 - Allies on the court with Block skills have their Block power increased by [Block] x (Lv1: 6%; Lv2: 7%; Lv3: 8%; Lv4: 9%; Lv5: 10%). 
2 - The cooldown of Skill 2 decreases by 2 net crossings. 
3 - When an ally activates a Serve skill, inflict the debuff effect "Angry" on opponents, reducing the opponent's [Quick Attack/Power Attack] stat by 10%. This effect lasts for 8 net crossings.

description.pt: Os atributos básicos do Korai aumenta em (Lv1: 6%, Lv2: 7%, Lv3: 8%, Lv4: 9%, Lv5: 10%). O atributo [Bloqueio] dos aliados na Linha de Ataque/Frente aumenta em (Lv1: 6%, Lv2: 7%, Lv3: 8%, Lv4: 9%, Lv5: 10%). Ao iniciar a partida, Korai recebe 1 acúmulo do efeito "All Rounder" e Hirugami recebe 1 acúmulo do efeito "Bloqueio Rígido".
description.en: Korai's basic stats increase by (Lv1: 6%, Lv2: 7%, Lv3: 8%, Lv4: 9%, Lv5: 10%). The [Block] stat of allies in the Attack/Front Line increases by (Lv1: 6%, Lv2: 7%, Lv3: 8%, Lv4: 9%, Lv5: 10%). At the start of the match, Korai gains 1 stack of the "All Rounder" effect and Hirugami gains 1 stack of the "Rigid Block" effect.

description.pt: Os atributos [Técnica de Ataque] de Ushijima e [Técnica de defesa] de Tendou aumentam em (Lv1: 3%, Lv2: 3.5%, Lv3: 4%, Lv4: 4.5%, Lv5: 5%).
description.en: Ushijima's [Attack Technique] and Tendou's [Defense Technique] stats increase by (Lv1: 3%, Lv2: 3.5%, Lv3: 4%, Lv4: 4.5%, Lv5: 5%).

description.pt:
Atributo [Técnica de Ataque] do Osamu aumenta em (Lv1: 3%, Lv2: 3.5%, Lv3: 4%, Lv4: 4.5%, Lv5: 5%) e os atributos básicos do Shinsuke aumentam em (Lv1: 3%, Lv2: 3.5%, Lv3: 4%, Lv4: 4.5%, Lv5: 5%). 
1 - Ao iniciar a partida, Atsumu recebe 3 acúmulos do efeito "Jogada Perfeita/Precisa". A cada acúmulo seu atributo [Passe] aumenta em 2%, até 10 acúmulos. 
2 - Shinsuke recebe 1 acúmulo do efeito "Ação Certeira". A cada acúmulo, seu atributo [Recepção] aumenta em 2%, até 3 acúmulos. 
3 - Aumenta a força do primeiro Ataque Rápido do Osamu presente em [Ataque Rápido] x 12%.
description.en:
Atsumu's [Attack Technique] stat increases by (Lv1: 3%, Lv2: 3.5%, Lv3: 4%, Lv4: 4.5%, Lv5: 5%) and Shinsuke's basic stats increase by (Lv1: 3%, Lv2: 3.5%, Lv3: 4%, Lv4: 4.5%, Lv5: 5%). 
1 - At the start of the match, Atsumu gains 3 stacks of the "Perfect/Accurate Play" effect. Each stack increases his [Set] stat by 2%, up to 10 stacks. 
2 - Shinsuke gains 1 stack of the "Sure Action" effect. Each stack increases his [Receive] stat by 2%, up to 3 stacks. 
3 - Increases the power of Osamu's first Quick Attack present in [Quick Attack] x 12%.

description.pt: Quando Ushijima corta a bola levantada por Shirabu, esse ataque terá a força de [Ataque Potente] x (Lv1: 260%, Lv2: 275%, Lv3: 290%, Lv4: 305%, Lv5: 320%). Nessa jogada, atributo [Força] de Ushijima é aumentado em 10%.
description.en: When Ushijima spikes a ball set by Shirabu, that spike will have the power of [Power Attack] x (Lv1: 260%, Lv2: 275%, Lv3: 290%, Lv4: 305%, Lv5: 320%). In that play, Ushijima's [Strength] stat increases by 10%.

description.pt: Quando Kuroo corta a bola levantada por Kenma, esse ataque terá a força de [Ataque Rápido] x (Lv1: 265%, Lv2: 280%, Lv3: 295%, Lv4: 310%, Lv5: 325%).
description.en: When Kenma SSR makes a pass, Kuroo UR performs a strengthened Quick Attack

description.pt: Quando Kuroo corta a bola levantada por Kenma, esse ataque terá a força de [Ataque Rápido] do Kuroo x (Lv1: 280%, Lv2: 300%, Lv3: 320%, Lv4: 340%, Lv5: 360%) e esse Ataque Rápido será uma Jogada Crítica. O atributo [Técnica de Ataque] dos aliados aumentam em 10%, esse efeito permanece até 1 set.
description.en: When Kuroo spikes a ball set by Kenma, that spike will have the power of Kuroo's Quick Attack x (Lv1: 280%, Lv2: 300%, Lv3: 320%, Lv4: 340%, Lv5: 360%) and that Quick Attack will be a Critical Hit. Allies' [Attack Technique] stats increase by 10%, and this effect lasts until the end of 1 set.

description.pt: O atributo [Reflexo] do Nishinoya aumenta em (Lv1: 5%, Lv2: 7.5%, Lv3: 7.5%, Lv4: 7.5%, Lv5: 10%). Quando Sugawara está em quadra e Nishinoya está com menos de 80 de Vigor, aumenta o atributo [Reflexo] do Nishinoya em mais (Lv1: 5%, Lv2: 5%, Lv3: 7.5%, Lv4: 10%, Lv5: 10%).
description.en: Nishinoya's [Reflex] stat increases by (Lv1: 5%, Lv2: 7.5%, Lv3: 7.5%, Lv4: 7.5%, Lv5: 10%). When Sugawara is on the court and Nishinoya has less than 80 Stamina, Nishinoya's [Reflex] stat increases by an additional (Lv1: 5%, Lv2: 5%, Lv3: 7.5%, Lv4: 10%, Lv5: 10%).

description.pt: Quando Nishinoya SSR ou Azumane SSR usam habilidade, ambos aumentam Técnica de Ataque e Técnica de Defesa.
description.en: When Nishinoya SSR or Azumane SSR usar a skill, both increase their Attack Technique and Defense Technique

description.pt:
1 - Ao ativar a habilidade de Recepção de um aliado, consome 1 acúmulo do efeito "Competitivo" e o aliado que for receber a bola recebe um aumento de 6% no atributo [Reflexo]. 
2 - Ao ativar uma habilidade de Recepção do Hinata, se o efeito "Competitivo" for consumido, o atributo [Reflexo] do Hinata aumenta em mais 9% e Kageyama recebe 1 acúmulo do efeito "Competitivo". 
3 - Quando Hinata ativa a habilidade Suprema, Kageyama recebe 1 acúmulo do efeito "Competitivo".
description.en:
1 - When an ally activates a Receive skill, consume 1 stack of the "Competitive" effect and the ally receiving the ball gains a 6% increase to their [Reflex] stat. 
2 - When Hinata activates a Receive skill, if the "Competitive" effect is consumed, Hinata's [Reflex] stat increases by an additional 9% and Kageyama gains 1 stack of the "Competitive" effect. 
3 - When Hinata activates his Special Move, Kageyama gains 1 stack of the "Competitive" effect.

description.pt: Quando Hinata corta a bola levantada por Kageyama, esse ataque terá a força de [Ataque Rápido] do Hinata x (Lv1: 280%, Lv2: 295%, Lv3: 310%, Lv4: 325%, Lv5: 340%), realizando o Ataque da Dupla Estranha.  1 - Nessa jogada, o atributo [Percepção] do Hinata aumenta 30% e o atributo [Força] dele aumenta em [Percepção] x (Lv1: 30% no máximo até 60%, Lv2: 35% no máximo até 70%, Lv3: 40% no máximo até 80%, Lv4: 45% no máximo até 90%, Lv5: 50% no máximo até 100%). Esse Ataque não é bloqueado. 2 - Quando o time aliado pontua, o CD do Ataque da Dupla Estranha é resetado. Se durante esse Ataque o efeito "Competitivo" do Kageyama for consumido, ele recebe 1 acúmulo desse efeito.
description.en: When Hinata spikes a ball set by Kageyama, that spike will have the power of Hinata's Quick Attack x (Lv1: 280%, Lv2: 295%, Lv3: 310%, Lv4: 325%, Lv5: 340%), performing the Strange Duo Attack.  1 - In that play, Hinata's [Awareness] stat increases by 30% and his [Strength] stat increases by [Awareness] x (Lv1: 30% up to a maximum of 60%, Lv2: 35% up to a maximum of 70%, Lv3: 40% up to a maximum of 80%, Lv4: 45% up to a maximum of 90%, Lv5: 50% up to a maximum of 100%). That Attack cannot be blocked. 2 - When the allied team scores, the Strange Duo Attack's cooldown is reset. If during that Attack Kageyama's "Competitive" effect is consumed, he gains 1 stack of that effect.

description.pt: Ao pontuar, aumenta a Moral do Time.
description.en: When scoring, increases Team Morale

description.pt:
1 - Quando o aliado toca na bola, consome 1 de Vigor a mais e os atributos básicos desse aliado aumenta em (Lv1: 3%; Lv2: Lv2: 3.5%; Lv3: 4%; Lv4: 4.5%; Lv5: 5%). Esse efeito permanece por 2 cruzamentos de rede. 
2 - Se esse toque do aliado for de Bloqueio, o atributo [Bloqueio] desse aliado aumenta em mais 5%. Esse efeito permanece por 2 cruzamentos de rede.
description.en:
1 - When an ally member touches the ball, consume 1 additional Stamina and increase that member’s main parameters by (Lv1: 3%; Lv2: 3.5%; Lv3: 4%; Lv4: 4.5%; Lv5: 5%) for 2 net crossings. 
2 - If that ball touch is a Block, that member’s Block increases by an additional 5% for 2 net crossings.

description.pt:
1 - Os atributos básicos dos aliados aumentam em (Lv1: 6%, Lv2: 7%, Lv3: 8%, Lv4: 9%, Lv5: 10%). 
2 - A cada término de rally, o efeito Debuff "Fúria" é aplicado nos adversários da Linha de Ataque/Frente, reduzindo em 10% o atributo [Ataque Rápido/Potente] deles. Esse efeito permanece por 8 passadas da bola pela rede. 
3 - Ao aplicar o efeito "Fúria" em um adversário que já está sob esse efeito, é aplicado a ele o efeito Debuff "Distração", reduzindo em 20% seu atibuto [Ataque Rápido/Potente]. Esse efeito permanece por até 8 passadas da bola pela rede. O adversário não consegue remover o efeito "Distração".
description.en:
1 - Allies’ main stats increase by (Lv1: 6%, Lv2: 7%, Lv3: 8%, Lv4: 9%, Lv5: 10%). 
2 - At the end of each rally, inflict [Angry] on the opponent’s front row (their [Power Spike]/[Quick Attack] –10%). This lasts until the ball has crossed the net 8 times. 
3 - If a target already has [Angry], apply [Distracted] instead (their [Power Spike]/[Quick Attack] –20%). This also lasts until the ball has crossed the net 8 times. [Distracted] cannot be cleansed/removed.

description.pt: O atributo [Recepção] do Nishinoya aumenta em (Lv1: 5%, Lv2: 7%, Lv3: 9%, Lv4: 11%, Lv5: 13%) e o atributo [Reflexo] aumenta em 5%. Quando a habilidade Suprema do Nishinoya for ativada, Kageyama recebe 1 acúmulo do efeito "Competitivo". Se essa jogada da habilidade Suprema resultar em uma Jogada Crítica, após essa jogada o primeiro aliado que for realizar um Ataque Rápido/Potente terá um aumento na força do Ataque em atributo [Ataque Rápido/Potente do aliado a atacar] x 20%.
description.en: Nishinoya's [Receive] increases by (Lv1: 5%, Lv2: 7%, Lv3: 9%, Lv4: 11%, Lv5: 13%) and his [Reflex] increases by 5%. When Nishinoya's Ultimate is activated, Kageyama gains 1 stack of the "Competitive" effect. If this Ultimate move results in a Critical Hit, the first ally to perform a Quick/Power Attack after this move will have their Attack Power increased by [Quick/Power Attack of the attacking ally] x 20%.

description.pt: Quando Iwaizumi corta a bola levantada por Oikawa, esse ataque terá a força de [Ataque Potente] x (Lv1: 255%, Lv2: 270%, Lv3: 285%, Lv4: 300%, Lv5: 315%). Recebe 2 acúmulos do efeito [Ritmo de Ataque]. A cada acúmulo, aumenta o atributo [Percepção] dos aliados em quadra. Esse efeito ocorre até 10 vezes.
description.en: When Iwaizumi spikes a ball set by Oikawa, that spike will have the power of [Power Attack] x (Lv1: 255%, Lv2: 270%, Lv3: 285%, Lv4: 300%, Lv5: 315%). He gains 2 stacks of the [Attack Rhythm] effect. Each stack increases the [Awareness] stat of allies on the court. This effect can occur up to 10 times.

description.pt: Quando o time aliado está com o Reforço de Moral do Time ativado, nesse período ao ativar Bloqueio Duplo/Triplo do time aliado, os aliados a bloquear o ataque adversário terá um aumento no atributo [Percepção] de (Lv1: 6%, Lv2: 7%, Lv3: 8%, Lv4: 9%, Lv5: 10% ), permanecendo esse efeito por 2 passadas da bola pela rede. No início dos rallys aumenta a Moral do time aliado em 20.
description.en: When the allied team has Team Morale Boost active, during that time when activating the allied team’s 2-person/3-person block, allies blocking the opponent’s attack will have their [Awareness] stat increased by (Lv1: 6%, Lv2: 7%, Lv3: 8%, Lv4: 9%, Lv5: 10%), and this effect lasts for 2 net crossings. At the start of rallies, increases the allied team’s Morale by 20.

name.pt: O Novo Capitão e o Novato Altão
name.en: The New Captain and the Tall Rookie

description.pt: Aumenta o Bloqueio dos jogadores na linha de frente.
description.en: Increases the Block of players in the front row

description.pt: Permite que Aone SSR e Futakuchi SSR usem a habilidade [Bloqueio Duplo]*.
description.en: Allows Aone SSR and Futakuchi SSR to use the Double Block skill

description.pt:
1 - Ao iniciar a partida, Kenma recebe 3 acúmulos do efeito "Defesa que Elimina Chances". O número máximo de acúmulos do efeito aumenta conforme nível (Lv1: 13, Lv2: 13, Lv3: 14, Lv4: 14, Lv5: 15). 
2 - A cada 1 de acúmulo do efeito "Defesa que Elimina Chances", o atributo [Percepção] do Kenma aumenta em (Lv1: 0.8%, Lv2: 1%, Lv3: 1%, Lv4: 1%, Lv5: 1.2%). Se Hinata realizar um Ataque Rápido, seu atributo [Ataque Rápido] aumenta em (Lv1: 1%, Lv2: 1.25%, Lv3: 1.25%, Lv4: 1.5%, Lv5: 1.5%).
description.en:
1 - At the start of the match, Kenma gains 3 stacks of the "Chance-Eliminating Defense" effect. The maximum number of stacks of this effect increases with level (Lv1: 13, Lv2: 13, Lv3: 14, Lv4: 14, Lv5: 15). 
2 - For each stack of the "Chance-Eliminating Defense" effect, Kenma's [Awareness] stat increases by (Lv1: 0.8%, Lv2: 1%, Lv3: 1%, Lv4: 1%, Lv5: 1.2%). If Hinata performs a Quick Attack, his [Quick Attack] stat increases by (Lv1: 1%, Lv2: 1.25%, Lv3: 1.25%, Lv4: 1.5%, Lv5: 1.5%).

description.pt: Aumenta a Recepção de Yaku SSR e o Ataque Rápido de Lev SSR.
description.en: Increases Yaku SSR’s Receive and Lev SSR’s Quick Attack

description.pt:
1 - Quando Koganegawa está em quadra, se pelo menos 2 pessoas desse Vínculo estiver presente, o Vínculo é ativado. 
2 - Quando os aliados realizam um Bloqueio Duplo/Triplo, o atributo [Técnica de Defesa] dos aliados da Linha de Ataque/Frente em (Lv1: 3%; Lv2: 4%, Lv3: 5%; Lv4: 6%; Lv5: 7%). Esse efeito permanece por 1 rally. 
3 - Quando o aliado ativa uma habilidade de Saque, ele não comete erro de Saque. 4 - No rally em que o aliado ativar a habilidade de Saque, quando o aliado realizar um Bloqueio Duplo/Triplo, o time recebe 1 acúmulo dos efeitos "Construir uma Muralha de Ferro" e "Bloqueio Resistente". Isso ocorrerá se Koganegawa e Aone estiverem em quadra.
description.en:
1 - When Koganegawa is on court, if at least 2 people from this Bond are present, the Bond is activated. 
2 - When allies perform a 2-person/3-person block, the [Defense Technique] stat of allies in the Attack/Front Line increases by (Lv1: 3%; Lv2: 4%, Lv3: 5%; Lv4: 6%; Lv5: 7%). This effect lasts for 1 rally. 
3 - When an ally activates a Serve skill, they do not make a Serve error. 4 - In the rally when an ally activates a Serve skill, when that ally performs a 2-person/3-person block, the team gains 1 stack of the effects "Build an Iron Wall" and "Sturdy Block". This occurs if Koganegawa and Aone are on court.

description.pt:
1 - Quando o aliado realiza um Passe, aumenta a [Percepção] em (Lv1: 10%, Lv2: 15%, Lv3: 20%, Lv4: 25%, Lv5: 30%), permanecendo esse efeito por 2 passadas da bola pela rede. 
2 - Se o Ataque Rápido do Hinata resultar em uma Jogada Crítica, o CD da habildiade 4 do Hinata diminui em 2 passadas da bola pela rede e a força do atributo [Perecpção] do Tsukishima aumenta em [Percepção do Hinata] x 50%, podendo aumentar até no máximo 50%. Esse efeito permanece por 4 passadas da bola pela rede.
description.en:
1 - When an ally makes a Set, increases their [Awareness] by (Lv1: 10%, Lv2: 15%, Lv3: 20%, Lv4: 25%, Lv5: 30%), and this effect lasts for 2 net crossings. 
2 - If Hinata's Quick Attack results in a Critical Play, the cooldown of Hinata's skill 4 decreases by 2 net crossings and Tsukishima's [Awareness] stat increases by [Hinata's Awareness] x 50%, up to a maximum increase of 50%. This effect lasts for 4 net crossings.

description.pt: Os atributos [Ataque Potente] do Sakusa e [Recepção] do Komori aumentam em (Lv1: 10%, Lv2: 12.5%, Lv3: 15%, Lv4: 17.5%, Lv5: 20%). A Recepção dos aliados aumentam com base em seu atributo [Recepção] x 20%.
description.en: Sakusa's [Power Attack] and Komori's [Receive] stats increase by (Lv1: 10%, Lv2: 12.5%, Lv3: 15%, Lv4: 17.5%, Lv5: 20%). Allies' Receive increases based on their [Receive] stat x 20%.

description.pt: Aumenta o Ataque Potente de TODOS os jogadores presentes.
description.en: Increases Power Attack of ALL players present

description.pt: Atributo [Recepção] do Daichi e atributo [Recepção] do Kuroo aumentam (Lv1: +1%+5, Lv2: +2%+7, Lv3: +3%+9, Lv4: +4%+12, Lv5: +5%+15).
description.en: Daichi's [Receive] stat and Kuroo's [Receive] stat increase by (Lv1: +1%+5, Lv2: +2%+7, Lv3: +3%+9, Lv4: +4%+12, Lv5: +5%+15).

description.pt:
Hisashi R: Aumenta Serve +5/7/9/12/15, Serve +1/2/3/4/5%
Kazuhito R: Aumenta Block +5/7/9/12/15, Block +1/2/3/4/5%
description.en:
Hisashi R increases Serve +5/7/9/12/15, Serve +1/2/3/4/5%
Kazuhito R increases Block +5/7/9/12/15, Block +1/2/3/4/5%

description.pt: Atributo [Saque] do Aone aumenta em (Lv1: 5+1%, Lv2: 7+2%, Lv3: 9+3%, Lv4: 12+4%, Lv5: 15+5%).
description.en: Aone's [Serve] stat increases by (Lv1: 5+1%, Lv2: 7+2%, Lv3: 9+3%, Lv4: 12+4%, Lv5: 15+5%).

description.pt:
Suna SSR: Aumenta Quick Attack +5/7/9/12/15, Quick Attack +1/2/3/4/5%
Osamu UR: Aumenta Block +5/7/9/12/15, Block +1/2/3/4/5%
description.en:
Suna SSR increases Quick Attack +5/7/9/12/15, Quick Attack +1/2/3/4/5%
Osamu UR increases Block +5/7/9/12/15, Block +1/2/3/4/5%

description.pt:
Jingo R: Aumenta Receive +5/7/9/12/15, Receive +1/2/3/4/5%
Sakunami R: Aumenta Quick Attack +5/7/9/12/15, Quick Attack stat by 6/7/8/9/10%
description.en:
Jingo R increases Receive +5/7/9/12/15, Receive +1/2/3/4/5%
Sakunami R increases Quick Attack +5/7/9/12/15, Quick Attack stat by 6/7/8/9/10%

description.pt: Atributo [Passe] do Oikawa aumenta em (Lv1: +1%+5, Lv2: +2%+7, Lv3: +3%+9, Lv4: +4%+12, Lv5: +5%+15).
description.en: Oikawa's [Set] stat increases by (Lv1: +1%+5, Lv2: +2%+7, Lv3: +3%+9, Lv4: +4%+12, Lv5: +5%+15).

description.pt:
Hinata SSR: Aumenta Block +5/7/9/12/15, Block +1/2/3/4/5%
Lev SSR: Aumenta Quick Attack +5/7/9/12/15, Quick Attack +1/2/3/4/5%
description.en:
Hinata SSR increases Block +5/7/9/12/15, Block +1/2/3/4/5%
Lev SSR increases Quick Attack +5/7/9/12/15, Quick Attack +1/2/3/4/5%

description.pt:
Nishinoya SR: Aumenta Save +5/7/9/12/15, Save +1/2/3/4/5%
Yaku SR: Aumenta Set +5/7/9/12/15, Set +1/2/3/4/5%
description.en:
Nishinoya SR increases Save +5/7/9/12/15, Save +1/2/3/4/5%
Yaku SR increases Set +5/7/9/12/15, Set +1/2/3/4/5%

description.pt: Os atributos [Saque] do Atsumu, [Ataque Rápido] do Osamu e [Ataque Potente] do Aran aumentam em (Lv1: 5+1%, Lv2: 7+2%, Lv3: 9+3%, Lv4: 12+4%, Lv5: 15+5%).
description.en: Atsumu's [Serve], Osamu's [Quick Attack], and Aran's [Power Attack] stats increase by (Lv1: 5+1%, Lv2: 7+2%, Lv3: 9+3%, Lv4: 12+4%, Lv5: 15+5%).

description.pt: Kenma SSR: Aumenta Set +5/7/9/12/15, Set +1/2/3/4/5%
description.en: Kenma SSR increases Set +5/7/9/12/15, Set +1/2/3/4/5%

description.pt:
